attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It cannot be right that one single individual can have the authority to use, with impunity, taxes taken under threat of criminalisation to bolster his own position by bribing the opposition to vote in favour of legislation which he knows is not supported by the whole of his own political party.  Our present prime minister is using the Treasury as his own personal slush fund and it must be stopped.  If ANY taxpayer pounds are spent on anything, then it must be the subject of a vote in a full sitting by the House of Commons.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
